H0.text: To which genus of plant does the Azalea belong. Rhododendron

H1.text: To which genus of plant does the Azalea belong. Camellia

H2.text: To which genus of plant does the Azalea belong. Magnolia

H3.text: To which genus of plant does the Azalea belong. Azaleia

A4.text: Azaleas are flowering shrubs in the genus Rhododendron
